entree.name: Apple Roast Chicken
entree.desc: Chicken things roasted with apples and Italian seasoning blend

entree.name: Fish Taco
entree.desc: Baja style fried white fish with shredded cabbage, guacamole, lime cream, and fresh salsa

entree.name: Chicken Piccata
entree.desc: Sliced boneless, skinless chicken thighs lightly battered and crisped in a strong lemon caper sauce

entree.name: Savory Roast Chicken
entree.desc: Chicken things roasted in a traditional poultry spice blend of thyme, rosemary, and sage

entree.name: Lemon Butter Caper Fish and Shrimp
entree.desc: Sauteed fish of the day served in a lemon, butter, caper sauce with shrimp and a side of rice

entree.name: Pasta Fresca with Chicken
entree.desc: Refreshing blend of fresh rosemary, basil, and chives tossed in short, thick pasta with tomatoes, balsamic vinegar, and sauteed chicken

entree.name: Sinigang
entree.desc: Beef or pork ribs that slide off the bone served in a tamarind and guava based stew with tomatoes, spinach, lettuce, onion

entree.desc: Delicata squash roasted and filled with chicken, quinoa, currants and sage

entree.name: Avocada Tempura and Chicken
entree.desc: Sauteed chicken topped with avocado lightly fried in tempura
entree.side: Spicy turnip fries or sweet potato fries

entree.desc: Ground beef served in a traditional taco seasoning, topped with tomatoes, avocado, shredded cheese, and lettuce

entree.desc: Horseshoe shaped tortellini pasta tossed with prosciutto, chicken, salami, parsley, rosemary, tomatoes

entree.name: Burrito Verde
entree.desc: Chicken burrito slow cooked with onion, fresh tomatillo in a chile verde salsa, filled with avocado, tomato and lettuce

entree.name: Roast Orange Honey Chicken
entree.desc: Chicken things roasted in an orange honey glaze

entree.name: Puerco Pibil
entree.desc: Pork shoulder slow roasted for hours in an annatto/achiote marinade and served over rice with lots of lime

entree.name: Crispy Catfish with Farro and Grape Relish
entree.desc: Catfish lightly battered served with a warm kale farro salad and topped with warm concord grape relish
